page.title: 09GARAGES
page.content: There has been a garage near the industrial estate for 41 years.During the war (1939-45) they made parts for areoplanes,guns and jeeps.The manager has been there 3.5 years,selling Volkswagons,which is a German car.It got its name from Adolf Hitler.It means peoples car.They also sell Audi cars,and some used cars which have been traded in for new ones.Volkwagon Golf is the most popular model in this area being a family car.They do a follow up checking service and repair all makes of car in the body shop which is the place where they repair cars that have crashed.32 people work at the garage.They arrive about 8.00am and work 10 hours.The manager always wanted to do this work but trained as a mechanic first.He has 80 cars at the garage altogether.
